title: 谁能给我一个1.14的神器制作指令！！！
author: 国服子弹⑧
txt_content:
谁能给我一个1.14的神器制作指令！！！

{一定的格式以及物品ID和附魔效果的ID，或者使用命令方块（注意：是java版！）}

replies.author: 我真狂
replies.txt_content:
/give @p minecraft:shield{Unbreakable:1b,Enchantments:[{id:"thorns",lvl:214999999}]}
给予   谁        物品英文名字          无法破坏                              附魔id     附魔等级

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 FHC红石 于 2019-8-22 17:47 编辑 

引用自：https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... 902184&pid=15330387
物品ID可以在关闭背包界面的状态下按F3+H，然后再打开背包，鼠标移动到物品上就有英文ID了
/give @p minecraft:diamond_sword{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,Amount:1,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,AttributeName:"generic.attackDamage",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:2,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,AttributeName:"generic.attackSpeed",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:3,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,AttributeName:"generic.maxHealth",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:4,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,AttributeName:"generic.movementSpeed",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:5,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,AttributeName:"generic.knockbackResistance",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:6,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:7,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,AttributeName:"generic.armorToughness",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:8,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,AttributeName:"generic.followRange",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:9,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,AttributeName:"generic.luck",Name:"CBC"}],display:{Name:"[{\"text\":\"这是物品名字\",\"color\":\"aqua\",\"bold\":false,\"italic\":false,\"underlined\":false,\"strikethrough\":false,\"obfuscated\":false}]",Lore:["{\"text\":\"这是物品的描述\",\"bold\":false,\"italic\":false,\"underlined\":false,\"strikethrough\":false,\"obfuscated\":false}"]},Unbreakable:1,HideFlags:63,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:aqua_affinity",lvl:1},{id:"minecraft:aqua_affinity",lvl:1},{id:"minecraft:aqua_affinity",lvl:1}]} 1

replies.author: ⊙u⊙
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 ⊙u⊙ 于 2019-8-22 00:21 编辑 

要梯，制作，几秒钟按按按就完事了
https://mcstacker.net/

replies.author: 无限生稽
replies.txt_content:
装备韧性值指令：/give @p minecraft:iron_sword{AttributeModifiers:[
武器伤害：
{AttributeName:"generic.attackDamage",Name:"CBC",Amount:999,Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L}
武器攻速：
{AttributeName:"generic.attackSpeed",Name:"CBC",Amount:999,Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L}
附加生命值：
{AttributeName:"generic.maxHealth",Name:"CBC",Amount:9,Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L}
移动速度：
{AttributeName:"generic.movementSpeed",Name:"CBC",Amount:6,Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1}
击退抗性：
{AttributeName:"generic.knockbackResistance",Name:"CBC",Amount:99,Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L}
护甲值：
{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"CBC",Amount:999,Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L}
盔甲韧性:
{AttributeName:"generic.armorToughness",Name:"CBC",Amount:2,Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L}
生物跟随距离：
{AttributeName:"generic.followRange",Name:"CBC",Amount:3,Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L}
幸运：
{AttributeName:"generic.luck",Name:"CBC",Amount:4,Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L}

分区指令UUID末尾处加:,Slot:mainhand/,Slot:offhand/,Slot:head/,Slot:legs，chest/,Slot:feet


末尾：}]}

隐藏属性：
HideFlags:2}
无法破坏：
],Unbreakable:1}
颜色:
display:{color:0}}

封魔指令：/give @p minecraft:diamond_sword{Enchantments:[{id:"sharpness",lvl:3},
{id:"ID",lvl:2}]} 1

（附魔名称）
保护        protection
火焰保护        fire_protection
轻盈        feather_falling
爆炸爆炸保护        blast_protection
投射物保护        projectile_protection
尖刺        thorns
水中呼吸        respiration
深海漫游        depth_strider
亲水性        aqua_affinity
锋利        sharpness
不死攻克星        smite
节肢攻克星        bane_of_arthropods
击退        knockback
燃烧        fire_aspect
掠夺        looting
效率        efficiency
丝绸之触        silk_touch
耐久        unbreaking
幸运        fortune
力量        power
冲击        punch
火焰        flame
无限        infinity
海洋的祝福        luck_of_the_sea
鱼饼干        lure
冰霜行的        frost_walker
修补        mending
绑定诅咒        binding_curse
消失诅咒        vanishing_curse
鱼叉        impaling
波涛        riptide
忠诚        loyalty
叫雷        channeling
分裂箭箭        multishot
贯穿        piercing
快速上弦        quick_charge
横扫的刀        sweeping

replies.author: 底层咸鱼
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 897412176 于 2019-8-22 19:12 编辑 

我怎么知道你要的神器神器是什么……
好歹也要说一下是拿来干什么的……
有打怪的，有挖矿的……
随便写一个好了：
give @p minecraft:stick{display:{Name:'{"text":"神器","color":"yellow","italic":"false"}'},AttributeModifiers:[{Slot:"mainhand",AttributeName:"generic.attackDamage",Name:"generic.attackDamage",Amount:1.798E308d,Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1},{Slot:"mainhand",AttributeName:"generic.attackSpeed",Name:"generic.attackSpeed",Amount:1.798E308d,Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1}],HideFlags:63s,Unbreakable:1b} 1复制代码
